name: Time for the Counterattack
type: The Seven Warlords of the Sea/Supernovas/Heart Pirates
effect: [Counter] If there is a Character with 8000 power or more, up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +4000 power during this battle.
trigger: [Trigger] Play up to 1 red Character card with 2000 power or less from your hand.
